Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"; format="fixed"

Here are some ways to stay in touch with the Write the Docs community.
------------------------------------------------------------
http://us6.campaign-archive1.com/?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D11736=
0ac5b&e=3D7a513065c9
http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11=
a325d03&id=3D1f1b7562af&e=3D7a513065c9

It=E2=80=99s been a few months since the conference=2C and we hope everyon=
e is enjoying their summer. We hope that you=E2=80=99ve kept some of the c=
onnections alive that you made at Write the Docs. In that spirit=2C we hav=
e a couple of announcements today that will help you stay connected.


** Talk videos are posted
------------------------------------------------------------

The talk videos (http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3D9=
4377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D2143d9ad81&e=3D7a513065c9)  are now li=
ve. We hope that you share them with friends and collegues that couldn=E2=
=80=99t make the conference.


** A Bay Area Meetup Group
------------------------------------------------------------

We have our first meetup group (http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage1.com/t=
rack/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D4bc78b5bbc&e=3D=
7a513065c9)  setting up! Ruth Buchanan (http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage.com/t=
rack/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D2797cf8b86&e=3D=
7a513065c9)  has organized a great first meeting=2C and we hope that anyone in th=
e area will come out and join. They are looking for speakers for the first=
 and following meetups=2C so check it out (http://writethedocs.us6.list-ma=
nage1.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D3549f5813f&e=3D=
7a513065c9) .

Details:
* Topic - Teaching & Learning: Framing Documentation as a Teaching Tool
* Date - Thursday=2C September 12th from 6-8 PM
* Venue - Hosted and Sponsored by Atlassian (http://writethedocs.us6.list-=
manage.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3Deb7b98508b&e=3D=
7a513065c9)
* Awesome - Free beer=2C wine=2C and pizza

If you are interested in setting up a meetup group in your own area=2C ple=
ase email us (mailto:eric%40ericholscher.com?subject=3DMeetup%20group)  if=
 we can help at all.


** A mailing list
------------------------------------------------------------

Write the Docs is a larger idea than the conference. A big part of that is=
 having a community around documentation. We have launched a mailing list=
 (http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a=
11a325d03&id=3Dad50d2e32a&e=3D7a513065c9)  that will allow people to=
 chat about documentation related things from across the globe. If you are=
 interested in chatting about docs or have questions you want to be answer=
ed=2C go ahead and sign up (http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage1.com/track=
/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D2bed1e5b76&e=3D7a513065c9)=
 .


** 2014 Details
------------------------------------------------------------

We are excited about having the conference again next year. We will be ann=
ouncing the dates of the conference=2C and putting up a website in the nex=
t couple months.
Cheers=2C
Write the Docs Team

ew-user-group-and-a-mailing-list" style=3D"color: rgb(62=2C 67=2C 73); fon=
t-family: Poly=2C 'goudy old style'=2C 'minion pro'=2C 'bell mt'=2C Georgi=
a=2C 'Hiragino Mincho Pro'=2C Helvetica=2C serif; font-size: 16.3636360168=
45703px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; le=
tter-spacing: normal; line-height: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: star=
t; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: au=
to; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">
=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09It&rsquo;s been a few months since the conference=2C and we hope eve=
ryone is enjoying their summer. We hope that you&rsquo;ve kept some of the=
 connections alive that you made at Write the Docs. In that spirit=2C we h=
ave a couple of announcements today that will help you stay connected.</p>
=09<div class=3D"section" id=3D"talk-videos-are-posted" style=3D"color: #5=
05050;font-family: Arial;font-size: 14px;line-height: 150%;text-align: lef=
t;">
=09=09<h2 style=3D"font-family: 'Hagin Caps Medium'=2C Garamond=2C Georgia=
=2C serif;font-weight: normal;margin: 30px 0px 10px;padding: 0px;font-size=
: 29.09090805053711px;color: #202020;display: block;line-height: 100%;marg=
in-top: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-bottom: 10px;margin-left: 0;text-align: l=
eft;">
=09=09=09Talk videos are posted</h2>
=09=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09The<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D=
"reference external" href=3D"http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage.com/track=
/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3Dbdf9db2a9d&e=3D7a513065c9" styl=
e=3D"color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decoration: none;border-bottom-width:=
 1px;border-bottom-style: dotted;border-bottom-color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);=
font-weight: normal;">talk videos</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space"=
>&nbsp;</span>are now live. We hope that you share them with friends and c=
ollegues that couldn&rsquo;t make the conference.</p>
=09</div>
=09<div class=3D"section" id=3D"a-bay-area-meetup-group" style=3D"color: #=
505050;font-family: Arial;font-size: 14px;line-height: 150%;text-align: le=
ft;">
=09=09<h2 style=3D"font-family: 'Hagin Caps Medium'=2C Garamond=2C Georgia=
=2C serif;font-weight: normal;margin: 30px 0px 10px;padding: 0px;font-size=
: 29.09090805053711px;color: #202020;display: block;line-height: 100%;marg=
in-top: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-bottom: 10px;margin-left: 0;text-align: l=
eft;">
=09=09=09A Bay Area Meetup Group</h2>
=09=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09We have our first<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</sp=
an><a class=3D"reference external" href=3D"http://writethedocs.us6.list-ma=
nage1.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D28cb9ccdcd&e=3D=
7a513065c9" style=3D"color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decoration: none;borde=
r-bottom-width: 1px;border-bottom-style: dotted;border-bottom-color: rgb(0=
=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: normal;">meetup group</a><span class=3D"Apple-=
converted-space">&nbsp;</span>setting up!<span class=3D"Apple-converted-sp=
ace">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"reference external" href=3D"http://writethed=
ocs.us6.list-manage2.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D47=
f4042f82&e=3D7a513065c9" style=3D"color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decorat=
ion: none;border-bottom-width: 1px;border-bottom-style: dotted;border-bott=
om-color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: normal;">Ruth Buchanan</a><span=
 class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>has organized a great first=
 meeting=2C and we hope that anyone in the area will come out and join. Th=
ey are looking for speakers for the first and following meetups=2C so<span=
 class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"reference extern=
al" href=3D"http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3D94377e=
a46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D56c8c34005&e=3D7a513065c9" style=3D"color: rgb(0=
=2C 75=2C 107);text-decoration: none;border-bottom-width: 1px;border-botto=
m-style: dotted;border-bottom-color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: norm=
al;">check it out</a>.</p>
=09=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09Details:</p>
=09=09<ul class=3D"simple" style=3D"margin: 10px 0px 10px 20px; padding: 0=
px;">
=09=09=09<li style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09=09Topic - Teaching &amp; Learning: Framing Documentation as a Te=
aching Tool</li>
=09=09=09<li style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09=09Date - Thursday=2C September 12th from 6-8 PM</li>
=09=09=09<li style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09=09Venue - Hosted and Sponsored by<span class=3D"Apple-converted-=
space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"reference external" href=3D"http://writeth=
edocs.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D7=
65489b749&e=3D7a513065c9" style=3D"color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decora=
tion: none;border-bottom-width: 1px;border-bottom-style: dotted;border-bot=
tom-color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: normal;">Atlassian</a></li>
=09=09=09<li style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09=09Awesome - Free beer=2C wine=2C and pizza</li>
=09=09</ul>
=09=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09If you are interested in setting up a meetup group in your own ar=
ea=2C please<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D=
"reference external" href=3D"mailto:eric%40ericholscher.com?subject=3DMeet=
up%20group" style=3D"color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decoration: none;bord=
er-bottom-width: 1px;border-bottom-style: dotted;border-bottom-color: rgb(=
0=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: normal;">email us</a><span class=3D"Apple-con=
verted-space">&nbsp;</span>if we can help at all.</p>
=09</div>
=09<div class=3D"section" id=3D"a-mailing-list" style=3D"color: #505050;fo=
nt-family: Arial;font-size: 14px;line-height: 150%;text-align: left;">
=09=09<h2 style=3D"font-family: 'Hagin Caps Medium'=2C Garamond=2C Georgia=
=2C serif;font-weight: normal;margin: 30px 0px 10px;padding: 0px;font-size=
: 29.09090805053711px;color: #202020;display: block;line-height: 100%;marg=
in-top: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-bottom: 10px;margin-left: 0;text-align: l=
eft;">
=09=09=09A mailing list</h2>
=09=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09Write the Docs is a larger idea than the conference. A big part o=
f that is having a community around documentation. We have launched a<span=
 class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"reference extern=
al" href=3D"http://writethedocs.us6.list-manage1.com/track/click?u=3D94377=
ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3D4c5f55ffb3&e=3D7a513065c9" style=3D"color: rgb(=
0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decoration: none;border-bottom-width: 1px;border-bott=
om-style: dotted;border-bottom-color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: nor=
mal;">mailing list</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>t=
hat will allow people to chat about documentation related things from acro=
ss the globe. If you are interested in chatting about docs or have questio=
ns you want to be answered=2C go ahead and<span class=3D"Apple-converted-s=
pace">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"reference external" href=3D"http://writethe=
docs.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=3D94377ea46d8b176a11a325d03&id=3Dbb=
1805b54d&e=3D7a513065c9" style=3D"color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);text-decorat=
ion: none;border-bottom-width: 1px;border-bottom-style: dotted;border-bott=
om-color: rgb(0=2C 75=2C 107);font-weight: normal;">sign up</a>.</p>
=09</div>
=09<div class=3D"section" id=3D"details" style=3D"color: #505050;font-fami=
ly: Arial;font-size: 14px;line-height: 150%;text-align: left;">
=09=09<h2 style=3D"font-family: 'Hagin Caps Medium'=2C Garamond=2C Georgia=
=2C serif;font-weight: normal;margin: 30px 0px 10px;padding: 0px;font-size=
: 29.09090805053711px;color: #202020;display: block;line-height: 100%;marg=
in-top: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-bottom: 10px;margin-left: 0;text-align: l=
eft;">
=09=09=092014 Details</h2>
=09=09<p style=3D"line-height: 1.4em;">
=09=09=09We are excited about having the conference again next year. We wi=
ll be announcing the dates of the conference=2C and putting up a website i=
n the next couple months.</p>
=09=09<div class=3D"line-block" style=3D"display: block;margin-top: 1em;ma=
rgin-bottom: 1em;color: #505050;font-family: Arial;font-size: 14px;line-he=
ight: 150%;text-align: left;">
=09=09=09<div class=3D"line" style=3D"color: #505050;font-family: Arial;fo=
nt-size: 14px;line-height: 150%;text-align: left;">
=09=09=09=09Cheers=2C</div>
=09=09=09<div class=3D"line" style=3D"color: #505050;font-family: Arial;fo=
nt-size: 14px;line-height: 150%;text-align: left;">
=09=09=09=09Write the Docs Team</div>
=09=09</div>
=09</div>
</div>
<br class=3D"Apple-interchange-newline">
